title: Whereas divers statutes were made, viz. 1. Car. 1. Against unlawfull assemblies for pastimes upon the Lords-Day. 3. Car. 1. Against carriers, butchers, drovers, carmen, &c For abuses committed by them upon the Lords-day. 21. Jac. 20. Against prophane swearing and cursing. 1. Jac. 9. 4. Jac. 5. 7. Jac. 10. 21. Jac. 7. and 1. Car. 4. Against tipling and drunkennesse. 3. Car. 3. Against unlicenced ale-houses. 4. Jac. 4. Against selling ale and beer to unlicenced ale-houses. 33. Hen. 8. cap. 9. Against unlawfull games. 2. and 3. Phil. & Mar. 9. All licences to keep houses for unlawfull games shall be void.
